Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

resource.description: Specifies an Amazon Redshift subnet group.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the parameter group.

type.description: The description of the parameter group.

properties.name: SubnetIds
properties.description: The list of VPC subnet IDs

type.description: The list of VPC subnet IDs

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The list of tags for the cluster parameter group.

type.description: The list of tags for the cluster parameter group.

attributes.description: Specifies an Amazon Redshift subnet group.

properties.name: ClusterSubnetGroupName
properties.description: This name must be unique for all subnet groups that are created by your AWS account. If costumer do not provide it, cloudformation will generate it. Must not be "Default".

type.description: This name must be unique for all subnet groups that are created by your AWS account. If costumer do not provide it, cloudformation will generate it. Must not be "Default".
